thread.title: Cyclists converge on Caribbean island

title: Cyclists converge on Caribbean island
text:
Friday 25th September 2015 Cyclists converge on Caribbean island 
Over 300 cyclists from around the world will travel to the Caribbean island of Tobago for the annual Tobago International Cycling Classic next week. The six-day event includes three days of mountain bike races, two days of fun races for children, and the culminating flagship race, the world-ranked UCI Tour of Tobago on Sunday October 4. The Tour of Tobago takes cyclists on a tough but scenic 74.5 mile course along Tobago's Caribbean Sea and Atlantic Ocean coastlines. For more information on Tobago Cycling Classic, visit www.gotrinidadandtobago.com. 
Friday, September 25, 2015
